actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an additional personal exemption for each senior citizen whose principal place of abode is in the principal residence of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers an additional personal exemption for each individual who is more than 64 years old and whose principal place of abode during the year is the principal residence of the taxpayer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an additional personal exemption for each senior citizen whose principal place of abode is in the principal residence of the taxpayer.
